description: The beginer tutorial talks about gccgo, but it seems to not be shipped with the current version of go. I've just added a link to the documentation on how to install it.

messages.text:
R=r

(Not sure if you were expecting this to be reviewed.
In the future, if so, run hg mail; if not, don't list
golang-dev in the reviewer field.)
the .txt and .html files must be updated together. a program in the doc directory does the work; see the Makefile
